title: StereoVLA: Enhancing Vision-Language-Action Models with Stereo Vision
summary: Stereo cameras closely mimic human binocular vision, providing rich spatial cues critical for precise robotic manipulation. Despite their advantage, the adoption of stereo vision in vision-language-action models (VLAs) remains underexplored.
